fields.description: There are 2 warnings in hadoop-datajoin module and 4 warnings in hadoop-ant module.
fields.summary: Fix findbugs warnings in hadoop-tools module

comments.body:
Attaching a patch. This patch will fix the findbugs warnings, however, the patch removes protected fields in abstract class (The class is not annotated {{@Public}} or {{@Stable}}). Therefore if an user extends the class and relies on the fields, the user's application will fail.
Would you tell me which way is better to do?
* Fix the warnings by removing protected fields.
* Ignore the warnings by creating findbugs-exclude.xml.

bq. For the reason, we can ignore the warning here. Could you update to create findbugs-exclude.xml?
Thanks [~ozawa] for your reply. I'll update the patch to ignore the warnings.

| (x) *{color:red}-1 overall{color}* |
